UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: De-novo design of antimicrobial peptides for plant protection.
Literature.Author: Zeitler B, Herrera Diaz A, Dangel A, Meyer H, Sattler M, Lindermayr C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Botrytis cinerea(MIC=64µg/ml),Alternaria alternata(MIC=>64µg/ml),Fusarium solani(MIC=16µg/ml),Cladosporium herbarum(MIC=>64µg/ml),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis DSM 46294(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum DSM 30168(MIC=>64µg/ml),Xanthomonas vesicatoria DSM 50861(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae DSM 10604(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas corrugata DSM 7228(MIC=>64µg/ml)
